metadata.title: CVE-2023-45925 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: GNU Midnight Commander 4.8.29-146-g299d9a2fb was discovered to contain aNULL pointer dereference via the function x_error_handler() attty/x11conn.c. NOTE: this is disputed because it should be categorized as ausability problem (an X operation silently fails).

criterions.comment: mc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
